src.models.hydrogen.model.actions

A sequencer for actions in the model. This may change up a bit, but it is a place to assert control of the execution sequence for now

Functions

check_optimal_termination(results)

This function returns True if the termination condition for the solver is 'optimal', 'locallyOptimal', or 'globallyOptimal', and the status is 'ok'
